artifacts.name: Weird Ball
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: While equipped, you recover quicker, especially in combat.

artifacts.name: Weird Bolt
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: As long as this bolt is charged and equipped, it reduces damage from anomalies. It takes a lot of anomalous energy to recharge though. Charge during an eruption.

artifacts.name: Weird Flower
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: If you sleep with this flower equipped, its fragrance will mask your scent, though the effect diminishes over time.

artifacts.name: Weird Nut
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: This unusual nut promotes rapid blood coagulation when worn, but wounds take longer to heal.

artifacts.name: Weird Pot
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: This item helps to allay one's thirst and hunger, but be careful: the Zone's gifts can be unpredictable.

artifacts.name: Weird Water
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: Radiation wont bother you as much. Makes moving around a bit smoother too, although you might feel drunk from time to time.
